title: Make-up
creator_credit: Centre for Educational Television Overseas Training Films and Lawrie Lawler
brief_description: Considers the basic rules of make-up, which apply to black and white television production. Demonstrates cleansing, applying the foundation, shading, lighting and powdering. The special treatment of the eyes, lips, hair and hands are shown. Demonstrated by Laura Bradish.
